alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 10:53PM CDT until April 12 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Prairie County in central Arkansas... Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern White County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1053 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Thurman to near McCreanor to near England to near Redfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lonoke... Des Arc... Hazen... De Valls Bluff... England... Carlisle... Redfield... Fredonia... Humnoke... Keo... Barrettsville... Thurman... McCreanor... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... Hensley Island... Peppers Landing... Brummitt... Prairie Center... Parkers Corner... Sisemore... This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 171 and 204. Interstate 530 between mile markers 15 and 26. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski; White
